Attachments

Source: vignettes/attach.Rmd
attach.Rmd
library(basecamper)

Attachments


METRUM <- '8514810'

attachments <- basecamper::basecamp_attachments(METRUM)

Inspecting Attachments

Print method for attachment object lists the names of the files attached in the project

print(attachments)
#>  [1] "Screen Shot 2019-06-04 at 12.06.10 PM.png"
#>  [2] "spec.zip"                                 
#>  [3] "report.zip"                               
#>  [4] "Stage4_01172017.pdf"                      
#>  [5] "QC.pdf"                                   
#>  [6] "1502QC.cpp"                               
#>  [7] "pediatricpk_r545.pdf"                     
#>  [8] "report102.pdf"                            
#>  [9] "report102.pdf"                            
#> [10] "report102.pdf"                            
#> [11] "QClog_10MAR2013_323PM.csv"                
#> [12] "proj"

Summary method for an attachment object returns a tibble with information about the files: filename, when it was created, file size and the url to download it (which is most important)

summary(attachments)
#> # A tibble: 12 x 4
#>    filename              created_on  filesize url                          
#>    <chr>                 <date>     <fs::byt> <chr>                        
#>  1 Screen Shot 2019-06-… 2019-06-04   174.66K https://metrumresearchgroup.…
#>  2 spec.zip              2019-02-11     8.14M https://metrumresearchgroup.…
#>  3 report.zip            2019-02-05    25.32M https://metrumresearchgroup.…
#>  4 Stage4_01172017.pdf   2017-01-17     1.83M https://metrumresearchgroup.…
#>  5 QC.pdf                2016-08-18   152.39K https://metrumresearchgroup.…
#>  6 1502QC.cpp            2016-08-18     1.07K https://metrumresearchgroup.…
#>  7 pediatricpk_r545.pdf  2015-05-11    82.45K https://metrumresearchgroup.…
#>  8 report102.pdf         2014-11-13   191.18K https://metrumresearchgroup.…
#>  9 report102.pdf         2014-11-11   116.61K https://metrumresearchgroup.…
#> 10 report102.pdf         2014-11-11   115.42K https://metrumresearchgroup.…
#> 11 QClog_10MAR2013_323P… 2014-03-10     9.17K https://metrumresearchgroup.…
#> 12 proj                  2013-07-15       380 https://metrumresearchgroup.…

Downloading Attachments

attach_summary <- summary(attachments)

(file_url  <- attach_summary$url[3])
#> [1] "https://metrumresearchgroup.basecamphq.com/projects/8514810/file/248538656/report.zip"

td <- tempdir()

basecamp_download(file_url,destdir = td)

Downloaded file information

list.files(td,pattern = '.zip$')
#> [1] "report.zip"

fs::as_fs_bytes(file.info(list.files(td,pattern = '.zip$',full.names = TRUE))[,'size'])
#> 25.3M

Unzip Archives

basecamper::unzip2 runs unzip from CLI which is more robust for files larger than 4gb which are truncated by utils::unzip


zipped_file <- list.files(td,pattern = '.zip$',full.names = TRUE)

basecamper::unzip2(directory = td,file = zipped_file)
#> Success!

Unzipped files information


zip_dir <- tools::file_path_sans_ext(list.files(td,pattern = '.zip$',full.names = TRUE))

unzipped_files <- fs::file_info(
  list.files(zip_dir,full.names = TRUE)
  )[,c('path','size')]

# clean up the path for printing
unzipped_files$path <- basename(unzipped_files$path)

unzipped_files
#> # A tibble: 72 x 2
#>    path                          size
#>    <chr>                  <fs::bytes>
#>  1 00qa.tex                       650
#>  2 00title.tex                    627
#>  3 02methods.log              496.82K
#>  4 appendices.tex               4.89K
#>  5 brief_r1139_LW.pdf         334.15K
#>  6 brief_r1139.pdf             346.1K
#>  7 brief_r1153.pdf            353.01K
#>  8 brief_r1169_signed.pdf     643.76K
#>  9 brief-signed.pdf           847.07K
#> 10 brief.aux                   12.08K
#> # … with 62 more rows
